alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 3:00PM AKDT until March 18 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 40 below occuring. Plan on areas of poor visibilities to create difficult travel conditions at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be on half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 45 below. * WHERE...Near the Bering Strait. * WHEN...Until noon Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Areas of low visibility will improve Friday morning as winds slowly decrease. Cold wind chills will develop late tonight and continue through noon Friday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
